briefdescription.para: Publishing UI, embeddable in a android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity.

detaileddescription.para: Use JREngage.showSocialPublishingDialog, JREngage.showSocialPublishingFragment, or JREngage.createSocialPublishingFragment to display.
